laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: In May 2009, lowest serum creatinine measured was 2.3 mg/dL two months post-transplantation. Serum creatinine was 3.3 mg/dL at the first allograft biopsy taken 4 months after transplantation, indicating initial decline and subsequent increase.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Markedly reduced to a level of 2.5 nmol/h per mg (reference range: 520â€“800 nmol/h per mg), consistent with APRT deficiency.
